original_text: After all that Hezekiah had so faithfully done, Sennacherib king of Assyria came and invaded Judah. He laid siege to the fortified cities, thinking to conquer them for himself.
korean_text: 이 모든 충성된 일을 한 후에 앗수르 왕 산헤립이 유다에 들어와서 견고한 성읍들을 향하여 진을 치고 쳐서 점령하고자 한지라

sentences.original_text: After all that Hezekiah had so faithfully done
sentences.korean_translation: 히스기야가 그렇게 충실하게 행한 모든 것 후에

sentences.original_text: He laid siege to the fortified cities
thinking to conquer them for himself
